content:
Do you think I'm dumb for buying a used PS4 PRO just one month before the launch of PS5?

So you don't remember the ppl who owned a Pokémon BW and bought a Pokémon BW2. Worse, who owned SM and bought USUM.

Why buying a enhanced version of a game, when the original could simply be updated, multiplatform and adapt to both old and new hardware?  10/8/20 18:14
